message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. Take this offer before inflation eats away at your share!
Alice, let's be fair. A 50/50 split ensures we both benefit.  This is my final offer.
The value of your potential gain diminishes with each round, Bob. I'm offering you a reasonable deal, but it won't last forever.
Alice, this is a compromise.  I understand you want a larger share, but my offer is fair considering the inflation working against me.
